headline.main: Trump Rejects Intel, Lawmakers Vow Probe of Russia Hacking
headline.print_headline: Trump Rejects Intel, Lawmakers Vow Probe of Russia Hacking

docs.snippet: Donald Trump on Sunday called a recent CIA assessment of Russian hacking "ridiculous" and says he's not interested in getting daily intelligence briefings — an unprecedented public dismissal by a president-elect of the nation's massive and s...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump on Sunday called a recent CIA assessment of Russian hacking "ridiculous" and says he's not interested in getting daily intelligence briefings — an unprecedented public dismissal by a president-elect of the nation's massive and sophisticated intelligence apparatus.

headline.main: Russia Says No Agreement With U.S. on Safe Exit for Aleppo Rebels-RIA
headline.print_headline: Russia Says No Agreement With U.S. on Safe Exit for Aleppo Rebels-RIA

docs.snippet: Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov said on Sunday that Moscow had not reached an agreement with the United States for rebel fighters in Syria's Aleppo to have safe passage out of the city, RIA news agency reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov said on Sunday that Moscow had not reached an agreement with the United States for rebel fighters in Syria's Aleppo to have safe passage out of the city, RIA news agency reported.

headline.main: Traverse City Law May Be Outdated in Age of Online Rentals
headline.print_headline: Traverse City Law May Be Outdated in Age of Online Rentals

docs.snippet: Some officials in Traverse City say home rental policies in the popular tourist town might need to be revised to adapt to the era of easy online lodging....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some officials in Traverse City say home rental policies in the popular tourist town might need to be revised to adapt to the era of easy online lodging.

headline.main: Inquiry Into Racial Bias in New York Prisons Is Big Job for Small Team
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Into Racial Bias in State Prisons Is Big Job for Small Team

docs.snippet: The investigation by the inspector general’s office aims to cover 54 prisons, 50,000 inmates and 20,000 corrections officers. In a previous inquiry, the office took a year to look into a single prison....
docs.abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo asks state inspector general's office to investigate pervasive racial discrimination in state prison system; civil rights inquiries of such massive scope are typically undertaken by federal prosecutors and FBI.

byline.original: By MICHAEL WINERIP and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ

docs.lead_paragraph: The investigation by the inspector general’s office aims to cover 54 prisons, 50,000 inmates and 20,000 corrections officers. In a previous inquiry, the office took a year to look into a single prison.

headline.main: Macedonia Queen of Gypsy Music Dies at Age 73
headline.print_headline: Macedonia Queen of Gypsy Music Dies at Age 73

docs.snippet: Esma Redzepova, one of the most powerful voices in the world of Gypsy music, has died in Macedonia's capital after a brief illness, according to local media. She was 73....
docs.lead_paragraph: Esma Redzepova, one of the most powerful voices in the world of Gypsy music, has died in Macedonia's capital after a brief illness, according to local media. She was 73.
